$LUI_i=\frac12(gi/gm)+\frac12(ti/tm)$  

$gi$=the number of grazing goats at site $i$
$ti$=the area of trenches in the seedling transect of site $i$
$gm$=The mean number of grazing goats across all sites
$tm$=the mean area of trenches in the seedling transect across all sites
